titleStmt.title: The declaration of His Excellency Iames Marques of Montrose, Earl of Kincairn, Lord Græme, Baron of Montdeu, Lieutenant Governour and Captaine Generall for His Maiestie of the kingdome of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Montrose, James Graham, Marquis of, 1612-1650.

notesStmt.note: With a blank preliminary and final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
